Judy.Why: Because he is easy to carry and, and it can’t check the image immediately, every photo are very precious

Intro.1: Good afternoon everyone, thank you for your time today.
Intro.3: My name is Judy and I’m here to talk about the Fujifilm camera.

Product.1:
It’s very easy to carry, whether its weight or volume are very light.
So you can put it in your packet, very convenient and unburdened.
Product.2:
Basically, most of the film cameras are second-hand. So its price will be cheaper than digital 低舉抖camera.
Although this camera is not second-hand, but it doesn't have many functions, so its price is between 350-400 dollars.
Product.3:
This camera is more easier than other film cameras.
It's easy to get started, I recommend this for everyone who is rookie of film cameras.

Features.1: Generally, digital camera can check the photo or delete it after you taking the photo, but film camera can’t. This is a big feature of the film camera, so every photo are very precious.
Features.2: Fuji's film camera is different from other film camera, it only can take 24 photos. You will think about the whole communication and perspective carefully.
Features.3: Lastly, its color is very cute with black, yellow and green and the size is small so you can take it out to dinner or parties and makes for a novel gift

Demo.1: First, you need to find the composition you wanted and keep a distance of more than one meter, otherwise the photo will be overexposed. Because the photos taken cannot be deleted. You will be make everything ok.
Demo.2: You need to turn on the flash, especially when you are indoors or meet the bad weather, otherwise the photo will be too dark.
Demo.3: You don't need adjust the aperture or set the shutter speed, just press the shutter to take a photo successfully.

Extra.1: Depending on the environment, the effect of the photo will be very different. Most of the photos will have feeling of old school.
Extra.2: After a roll of film completed, the photo studio will develop the photos which takes time so You will look forward to the results of the photos.
Extra.3: The film camera is very suitable for novices learning photography否他個ㄈㄧˇ, because its cheap and disposable but you can still get the feeling of Analog/natural photography

Close.1: That’s all for my presentation today.
Close.2: This camera is very common. Almost every photo studio will sell.
Close.3: If you have any questions let me know.

Robin.Product: Taiger SV-1 Waterproof black bomber jacket
Robin.Why: I love small brands with potentials

Intro.1: Hello everyone, welcome back from the break.
Intro.2: My name is Robin and the merchandise I brought today will blow your mind.
Intro.3: Please allow me to introduce my favorite jacket on the market - the Taiger bomber  jacket

Product.1: Taiger sportswear has strictly followed our main principle which is to design all products to fulfill the needs of functional ability when exercising and daily clothing selection for fitness enthusiasts
Product.2: The Taiger bomber jacket is one of the best vintage edition of the year, which is recognized by consumers with its unique 3M reflective logo and Taiger reflective logo.
Product.3: Brand safety is important and Taiger is most proud of its return policy which they are confident about their goods, Taiger will cover the shipping fees if the customer wishes to return and get a refund and  compensation for customers who has received defected products accidentally.

Features.1: This jacket is designed to wear both in and outside of the gym with  4 pockets on the exterior and upgraded all zippers to waterproof level.
Features.2: The jacket is made of 100% polyester for its exterior featuring with water proof and high cold resistance degree.
Features.3: You can also notice the distinct reflective logo which shows you have a unique quality brand that is functional and stylish

Demo.1: Use a laundry bags and cold wash when washing this item
Demo.2: Since the bomber jacket is designed sightly oversize, so wear an oversized tshirt inside might go well with the jacket.
Demo.3: Zip up your jacket while riding your motorcycle on a rainy day to keep the rain from soaking up your shirt.

Extra.1: One of the featuring criteria of Taiger which separates us from other brands is that we deliver worldwide with free shipping all times.
Extra.2: Taiger used anti pull fiber for all cotton parts of this jacket in order to extend and maximize its capacity.
Extra.3: The jacket uses water proof material to maintain the shape while wearing it, therefore it keeps the classic masculine shape of the original bomber jackets for pilot during world war 2.

Close.3: This jacket is a perfect fit for both in and out of the gym.

Yui.Product: prepaid transportation card sharp of cat paws
Yui.Why: At first, I have the supernatural power to erase things instantly. Most of my transportation is by bus, Then I have to take a card and put immediately when I get on or off the bus. However, because of my supernatural powers, When getting on and off does not go smoothly every time, then my emotion is so However, Before I get this product, because of my supernatural powers, getting on and off does not go smoothly every time, then I get annoyed every time, Why does it disappear instantly after every ride? Did I put it to the bag? Did I put it to my backpack pocket? every time like that. Why does it disappear instantly after every ride? Did you put it in the bag? Did you put it in your backpack pocket?  After having this product it all settled.  This product has a bell, so if it disappears, I can find it by shaking the bag.  This product is small and has a key ring so I can put it on my finger when I go out. Other women puts rings on her finger, and Me? put catpaw, lol. Of course when bus arrives, I can get on and off smoothly, Now there is no stress.  And above all, I'm very happy when I have it.  This product was sent by a friend as a birthday gift. So it's suitable as gift!

Lin.Why: It’s good for you health and personal care.

Intro.1: Hello everyone, I’m Lin.
Intro.3: My product today is Lucas Papaw ointment.

Product.1: This product is commonly used to treat minor open wounds.
Product.2: You can also use it to smooth your broken skin or heal your sun burn.
Product.3: This famous product is from Australia and very good for everyone

Features.1: For the features part, Placing the ointment over your wound can be used as a thin barrier for the affected areas.
Features.2: It is made from papaw fruit and petroleum jelly.
Features.3: Using Lucas Papaw Ointment on wounds will speed up the healing process allowing your skin to recover more quickly.

Demo.1: It’s your choice to buy a red jar which is handy at home or just a tube to carry it with you everywhere.
Demo.2: Depending on the area, take an amount and Gently place over your skin
Demo.3: If its a wound put on a clean dressing such as a Band-Aid.

Extra.1: First, this product is also good for sensitive babies with nappy rash so many mothers use it
Extra.2: Second, it also can be used for regular moisture of dry skin
Extra.3: In conclusion, it is very versatile and everyone should keep some when travelling or in the home

Close.2: You can get this product at a pharmacy or online that cost about 200NT.

Winnie.Why: Because I have been wearing this watch for six years. It’s a strong watch.

Intro.1: Good afternoon everyone, thank you for your time today.
Intro.3: I’m Winnie and my product today is the G-shock watch.

Product.1: It is a product not only for keeping time but also alarms and timers.
Product.2: The company is famous for electronics, and this this brand of watch is very popular now
Product.3: It is also designed for active people who do sport or exercise

Features.1: One great feature is the strap, the resin material is very waterproof and durable
Features.2: The next feature is the surface, the mineral glass material is not easy to break.
Features.3: Lastly, there are hundreds of different styles for this watch to suit any kind of person.

Demo.1: Press the first button for 5 seconds, you can adjust the time.
Demo.2: Press the third button, the surface light will be on for 1 second, you can watch the time at night.
Demo.3: Press the third button for 3 seconds, the light turn on when you raise your hand which is good for night time

Extra.1: Firstly, the price is a little high, but the battery can last for 6-7 years, and there is one year warranty
Extra.2: Also, you can store 4 different country time zone, so its good for business and travel
Extra.3: Last of all, you can set 5 alarms everyday, so you can always be on time

Close.1: So that’s all for my presentation today.
Close.2: If you want to buy it, you can get it online or in department store.
Close.3: If you have any question, you can call them.

Intro.1: Hello everyone! I’m so glad you guys can be here today.
Intro.3: I'm Mavis and my product today is Vaseline.

Product.1: Is an American brand by British-Dutch company Unilever used for more than 140 years as a healing balm
Product.2: It has many uses, including personal care, baby care, and beauty and ointment for wounds, burns, and chafed skin.
Product.3: It is a household name and most people have it around the home and today I'll explain why.

Features.1: One great feature is It's made with 100% pure petroleum jelly, so there are no dangerous chemicals inside
Features.2: It is handy and light, and it has different size you can choose from very small jars to large containers.
Features.3: Lastly, the price is good for everyone to buy it, also it's easy to buy and every shop had sell it.

Demo.1: Use your finger or cotton bud to grab a little jelly, and put it on where you want then spread evenly.
Demo.2: It's quite safe so don't worry about eyes or mouth but if it touches your clothes it might leave a stain, so be careful
Demo.3: Seal tightly after each use and keep it in a cool and dry place, avoid damp or sunlight.

Extra.1: If you go to travel, and forget to bring the cleansing oil. You can use Vaseline to remove makeup.
Extra.2: If you like to paint your nails at home, it can prevent skin stains from hair dye or nail polish
Extra.3: Also, if you have a new tattoo, you can use it to cover the tattoo. It can avoid you feel itchy on your skin.

Close.1: So as you can see this product is very useful, but you also need to check the product is good for your skin.
Close.2: I suggest everyone keeps some handy with you or at home
Close.3: Thanks, I can answer any question if you have them.
